message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can move on to the next round.
I'll take the majority, you can have a small consolation prize. Your turn to negotiate!
Not a good start, Bob. I'm looking for a more balanced split. Let's try again.
Let's try to find a more balanced split, Bob. This is a fair offer, I think.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect it to get any better from here.
Not good enough, Bob. I'm not going to accept a deal that's so heavily skewed in your favor. Let's try again.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Bob. Let's try to find a mutually beneficial deal.
I'm not getting any softer, Alice. You can try to do better if you want to.
You're not getting any softer either, Bob. I need a better deal than that. Let's try again.
I'm trying to find a balance, Bob. Let's meet somewhere in the middle and end this.
I'm taking control, Alice. You can either accept or get nothing.
Not going to take that lying down, Bob. I'm not going to let you take control. Let's try again.
I'm not backing down, Bob. Let's try to find a compromise that works for both of us.
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, Alice.
Not going to take your final offer, Bob. I'm not going to get taken advantage of. Let's try again.
I'm running out of time, Bob. Let's try to find a deal that's fair to both of us.
This is my last chance. Take it or we both walk away with nothing.
Fine, Bob. I'll take the 50,000. It's better than nothing.
